subject: Re: [junit] time overhead
msgSnippet: hi, I too tried too sell the same idea. Initially, they were hesitant but I convinced them to use it once. Initially it may look as if its consuming time.
messageBody:
hi,
I too tried too sell the same idea. Initially, they were hesitant but I convinced them to use it once. Initially it may look as if its consuming time.

After using it once, they realised that lot of time is saved in debugging .

regards
Suresh

Carniel Frederic <frederic.carniel@...>:

> I tried to sell test first approch on java in my companie with junit
> and
> other tools for servlet testing (we use tomcat and sun jdk).
> The main question is :
> What is the overhead of time for coding test first ?
> Does someone know some comparaison document on time coding between
> standard
> coding and test first coding ?
> Could you give me a feed back of your experience?
> does it take more time or the same time ?
>
> Thank you
